abstract.p: I. Introduction: Terms of Reference, 301.--II. The Concept of Progress, 302.--III. The Cure for Unemployment, 305.--IV. Income Aggregates as Criteria of Development, 309.--V. Development Planning, 310.--VI. The Need for External Capital, 315.--VII. Private Investment, Government Lending, and Intergovernmental Grants, 320.--VIII. Concluding Observations, 325.
